entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
